text: Ellegarden is a Japanese band formed in 1998 by four young men.Their activity pauses now. ==Members== Hosomi Takeshi(Guiter&Vocal;) Ubukata Shinichi(Guiter) Takada yuichi(Bass) Takahashi Hirotaka(Drums) == References == Category:Japanese rock bands Category:Punk bands Category:Emo bands Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:Musical quartets Category:Pop punk bands Category:Organizations based in Chiba Prefecture
title: Ellegarden
